entry.content: I subscribed to ChessDojo membership for a month and I want to try out if a structured training program actually helps me improve more quickly, the method so far seems very sound. A community to discuss and other improvers who are part of a cohort. Let's see if I am actually able to improve. Currently I'm rating around mid 1300 on chess.com rapid
